column4: I installed ubuntu... and it is giving me the following error after the installation: http://rafb.net/p/3s67Xd81.html
Scunizi... dont worry.. just need assistance
rich :   do another partition on the disk and formatt it
scunizi: actually there's no cd or dvd on the computer... the HD is IDE
RICH: take the master drive off the computer... GOOGLE IT... and then put the slave in the place of the master and install another OS
it will do it
rich.. go to google
it is simple
im having a weird issue here :S http://rafb.net/p/3s67Xd81.html
rich... GOOGLE
were you installing to a blank hd?
yes, and actually it works on another computer
jerbull: it is just on the one i want to have it
rich: YES
so the one thats not working was a clean slate when u tried to install ubuntu
jerbull: yes it was clean. It worked on another computer.. I transferred to the one where I want to have it and it is not working.. if i take it to this computer it works
what year is the bios dated?
jerbull: let me check
Jerbull: it is 1998
rich: absolutly
Ramone, that may be the issue, its a little old for ubuntu, ubuntu has a cutoff at 2000 after that it has to emulate and that could cause issues
jerbull: and there's no solution for that?
unfortunately a new BIOS
